channel.description: Basic User Management Review Questions Q. What would the command useradd -D do? A. This command displays the defaults settings used at the time of user creation or modification. Q. What does the lastlog command do? A. The lastlog command provides information about recent user logins. Q. What would the command useradd user500 do? A. The command provided will add user500 with all predefined default values. Q. The id and groups commands are useful for listing a user identification. True or False. A. False. Only the id command is used for this purpose.
